name: Beach Belly Ball!
description:
Battle belly-on-belly to become the beach's best belly baller! Booyah!

Beach Belly Ball is a free goofy two player sports-like with unreliable wacky physics!
Take control of four (4) of your keyboard keys to master the art of the belly and dunk on your opponent.

FEATURES

  • Jumping!!
  • Over SIX hats to unlock!

She's a bit rough around the edges but after years of trying this is my first fully completed project (!) and I'm proud of my little bellies.  I would love for you to give it a go and let me know if you enjoy it.  :)


CONTROLS:
Player 1 - Arrow Keys
Player 2 - WASD
Both players must hold 'down' to serve.

Pause / Controls - Esc
Mute - M

Online remote play with friends is possible as detailed in the readme.
Created with Unity and Doodle Studio 95!
